Total Pb concentrations had a considerable range from 9.36 to 793.3 mg.kg −1 with an average value of 181±167 mg.kg −1, with 97% of topsoils higher than the baseline value of 12.5 ± 2.3 mg.kg −1. The average value of 181 mg.kg −1 Pb in Ahvaz surface soil is higher than the target value of 85 mg.kg −1 suggested by The Netherlands soil contamination guideline
